name: Deliver At All Costs
description:
Features

Jump, demolish and boost your nitro equipped pickup truck around town, as you deliver packages to their rightful recipients, while not having a care in the world for traffic regulations or other people’s property.

The game features a GLOBAL LEADERBOARD that lets you compete with fellow players around the globe.

Story

Groundhog day. Impossible schedules. Eternal gridlocks. Thankless, impatient customers and their insatiable materialistic dispositions. Your rabid boss… ”Being let go” should have been a blessing, but somehow you care enough to feel disgruntled. Betrayed. Sitting behind the wheel of your old pickup truck on the way to your last day of work, you can hear the booming voice of your boss in the back of your head: ”I don’t care about excuses Ford. Deliver at all costs!” 

This time, you decide to take it literally.

Developers

This is a school project at Yrgo, Gothenburg made by:

Artists:

Lars Olsson, Oscar Elmgren, Jimmy Hultén, Simon Bengtsson

Programmers:

Daniel Nielsen, Jakob Bülow, Robin Vondrak

Sound credits:

Music from public domain.
Royalty free sounds from www.zapsplat.com/
